attributes.title: Who allowed this
attributes.review: I downloaded this app as a requirement for my 5th semester in elementary. I am a single mother trying to support my houseplant, named screwdriver, and I. When I downloaded the app all it would do is glitch and show me this picture of an orange Cheeto puff. The disgrace every person who contributed to putting this app together should be ashamed. The amount of trauma stinky Cheeto puff can cause people is absurd and I sure do hope the plan to compensate the emotion, physical, and mental damage from having to endure the sight. I will be expecting my check in the mail stinky Cheeto man.
